text: Henry Arthur Barrows (April 29, 1875 – March 25, 1945) was an American actor who appeared in films from 1913 to 1936. Barrows was born in Saco, Maine. He died in Los Angeles, California in 1945 and was interred there in the Los Angeles National Cemetery. He is the father of actor George Barrows. ==Partial filmography== * Her Nerve (1913) * On Suspicion (1914) * The Gold Thief (1914) * The Guiding Fate (1914) * A Woman's Folly (1914) * All for Business
